fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.render.primitive

Interface GLDisplayable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable, Task
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDisplayable, DisplayableCurve, DisplayablePoint, DisplayableSurface

    public interface GLDisplayable
extends Task
    Author:
    JeT A GLDisplayable is an object drawn in a GL Panel. Those objects are generated asynchronously and are able to give a fast and simple representation of themselves during asynchronous GLComplex generation fast representation is called "partialRepresentation" complete is called "fullRepresentation"

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Cleanup the GLDisplayable and make it ready for garbage collection.
      long getDisplayCount()
      get the number of time this displayable has been displayed on screen
      Collection<GLComplex> getFullRepresentation()
      Asynchronous method returning a full representation of the object.
      Date getLastDisplayTime() 
      GLComplex getPartialRepresentation()
      Synchronous method returning a quick and dirty representation of the object

      • Methods inherited from interface Task

        addTaskListener, getError, getName, getProgress, getState, getTaskListenerCount, getThread, isPausable, isProgressable, isStoppable, removeAllTaskListener, removeTaskListener, requestPause, requestPlay, requestStop, start, start

      • Methods inherited from interface Runnable

        run

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayCount

        long getDisplayCount()
        get the number of time this displayable has been displayed on screen

      • getLastDisplayTime

        Date getLastDisplayTime()
        Returns:
        the last time this displayable has been displayed

      • getPartialRepresentation

        GLComplex getPartialRepresentation()
        Synchronous method returning a quick and dirty representation of the object

      • getFullRepresentation

        Collection<GLComplex> getFullRepresentation()
        Asynchronous method returning a full representation of the object. It returns null if the computation is not finished. Listen to the task state change to know when this method will return a non null value

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Cleanup the GLDisplayable and make it ready for garbage collection.
